defineservice.name: metratech.com/IncrementalDiscountPT
defineservice.description: Parameter table for configuring IncrementalDiscount Decision attributes

ptype.description: Tier start for the range of units covered by the incremental discount decision.
Tier end for the range of units covered by the incremental discount decision.
Discount percentage for the number of units for the charge that fall within the StartOfUnitRange and EndOfUnitRange. Value must be between 0 and 100.
